moduleMetadataJson.name: Wireshark CLDAP Dissector DOS
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module causes infinite recursion to occur within the
        CLDAP dissector by sending a specially crafted UDP packet.
author: joernchen <joernchen <joernchen <joernchen@phenoelit.de> (Phenoelit)>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: SHOST
options.description: This option can be used to specify a spoofed source address
